metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0247 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
LibreOffice 4.2.4 executes unspecified VBA macros automatically, which has unspecified impact and attack vectors, possibly related to doc/docmacromode.cxx.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libreoffice-mysql-connector - 1:4.2.4-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

libreoffice-wiki-publisher - 1:4.2.4-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 4.x only Due to the size of libreoffice, and the non-critical nature of this issue, we are not going to release an update for Ubuntu 13.10 users before its EoL date
